project.name: munit
project.description: MassiveUnit is a cross-platform Haxe unit testing framework that utilises haxe metadata markup for test cases and includes tools for generating, compiling and running test cases from the command line. Supports js, swf8, swf9, neko and c++
project.version: Minor bug fixes (CLI support for debug cpp builds, added catch for when process throws exception before process.exitCode()). See CHANGES.txt for full change list.
